ProcessArray.title: Get a Price.
ProcessArray.description: Tell us about you, your home, and your cleaning needs.

ProcessArray.title: Book It.
ProcessArray.description: We'll make your home shine, and run any errands you'd like.

ProcessArray.title: Breathe, smile, relax.
ProcessArray.description: The house is clean, the errands are done. Time to come home.

AssuranceArray.title: We never cancel. Ever.
AssuranceArray.description: Cleaning is a commitment. If we were to cancel, we'd pay you $100. Guaranteed.

AssuranceArray.title: Your happinness, guaranteed
AssuranceArray.description: We ask for feedback after each visit. If you're not 100% satisfied with our services, we will make it right.

AssuranceArray.title: Know who's in your home
AssuranceArray.description: Want the same cleaning team every time? We can make that happen, just let us know when you sign up for service.

AssuranceArray.title: Quality control
AssuranceArray.description: Our quality control inspectors follow behind our teams to make sure we deliver the sparkly results we promise.
